parameters.query:
=-- 기존 데이터와 중복되지 않도록 임시 테이블 사용
CREATE TEMP TABLE temp_training_data AS
SELECT 
    b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE as broadcast_date,
    EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp)::INTEGER as hour,
    CASE EXTRACT(DOW FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp)
        WHEN 0 THEN '일' WHEN 1 THEN '월' WHEN 2 THEN '화'
        WHEN 3 THEN '수' WHEN 4 THEN '목' WHEN 5 THEN '금' WHEN 6 THEN '토'
    END as day_of_week,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 0 AND 5 THEN '새벽'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 6 AND 11 THEN '오전'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 12 AND 17 THEN '오후'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 18 AND 23 THEN '저녁'
    END as time_slot,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN '봄'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN '여름'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (9, 10, 11) THEN '가을'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN '겨울'
    END as season,
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (0, 6) as is_weekend,
    g.product_code, g.product_name, g.category_main, g.category_middle, g.category_sub,
    g.price, g.brand, g.product_type, b.product_is_new,
    t.tape_code, t.tape_name,
    w.weather, w.temperature, w.precipitation,
    CASE WHEN h.holiday_date IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END as is_holiday,
    h.holiday_name, b.gross_profit, b.sales_efficiency
FROM TAIBROADCASTS b
INNER JOIN TAIPGMTAPE t ON b.tape_code = t.tape_code
INNER JOIN TAIGOODS g ON t.product_code = g.product_code
LEFT JOIN taiweather_daily w ON b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE = w.weather_date
LEFT JOIN TAIHOLIDAYS h ON b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE = h.holiday_date
WHERE b.broadcast_start_timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND b.gross_profit IS NOT NULL
  AND b.product_is_new IS NOT NULL
  AND g.product_type IS NOT NULL;

INSERT INTO broadcast_training_dataset (
    broadcast_date, hour, day_of_week, time_slot, season, is_weekend,
    product_code, product_name, category_main, category_middle, category_sub,
    price, brand, product_type, product_is_new, tape_code, tape_name,
    weather, temperature, precipitation, is_holiday, holiday_name,
    gross_profit, sales_efficiency
)
SELECT * FROM temp_training_data t
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM broadcast_training_dataset b
    WHERE b.tape_code = t.tape_code
      AND b.broadcast_date = t.broadcast_date
      AND b.hour = t.hour
);

SELECT COUNT(*) as inserted_count FROM temp_training_data t
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM broadcast_training_dataset b
    WHERE b.tape_code = t.tape_code
      AND b.broadcast_date = t.broadcast_date
      AND b.hour = t.hour
);

nodes.name: 5️⃣ 학습 데이터셋 생성
nodes.notes: TAIBROADCASTS 마이그레이션 후 학습 데이터 생성

nodes.name: 4️⃣ 임베딩 생성 (동기)
nodes.notes: 완료될 때까지 대기 (최대 30분), 결과 즉시 확인

parameters.content:
## 📝 전체 마이그레이션 워크플로우

**실행 시간:** 매일 새벽 2:00

**처리 순서:**
1. ✅ TAIGOODS 마이그레이션 (상품 마스터)
2. ✅ TAIPGMTAPE 마이그레이션 (방송테이프)
3. ✅ 임베딩 생성 (방송 가능 상품만)
4. ✅ TAIBROADCASTS 마이그레이션 (방송 이력, 병렬)
5. ✅ 학습 데이터셋 생성 (TAIBROADCASTS 후)

**중요:**
- TAIGOODS가 성공해야 TAIPGMTAPE 실행
- TAIPGMTAPE가 성공하면 임베딩 생성 + TAIBROADCASTS 병렬 실행
- TAIBROADCASTS 완료 후 학습 데이터셋 자동 생성
- 중복 데이터 자동 필터링 (tape_code + 날짜 + 시간)
- 각 단계는 증분 업데이트 (어제 이후 수정분)

**전체 재처리:**
- 각 노드에서 full_sync를 true로 변경

**장점:**
- 의존성 순서 보장
- 단계별 실패 처리
- 불필요한 임베딩 생성 방지
- 병렬 처리로 시간 절약
- XGBoost 학습 데이터 자동 생성
